original_text: So the priest gave him the consecrated bread, since there was no bread there except the bread of the Presence that had been removed from before the Lord and replaced by hot bread on the day it was taken away.
korean_text: 제사장이 그 거룩한 떡을 주었으니 거기는 진설병 곧 여호와 앞에서 물려 낸 떡밖에 없었음이라 이 떡은 더운 떡을 드리는 날에 물려 낸 것이더라

sentences.original_text: So the priest gave him the consecrated bread
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 제사장은 그에게 거룩한 떡을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: since there was no bread there
except the bread of the Presence
that had been removed from before the Lord
on the day it was taken away
